item.description:
Join us in Rockport for high tea at Heath's Tea Room and the Annual Holiday Stroll.Â  Let's have tea and some food, then meet Rockport's artists in their studios (1:00 - 4:00 pm) and stroll throughout downtown Rockport.

Here's info on Heath's Tea Room

http://www.heathstearoom.com/About.html

I know it's late so if by Saturday evening around 8:00 pm we don't have 3-4 reliable people signed up for this I'll probably cancel.

Hope to see you Sunday!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: CHRISTMAS IN ROCKPORT- High Tea and Holiday Gallery Stroll
